observation: Uwharrie Bank – Making A Difference  [Skip to Content] Online Banking Business Online Banking Credit Card Online Access CONTACT US CUSTOMER SERVICE LOCATIONS & ATMs EDUCATION Search for: Report A LOST OR Stolen CARD Menu MENU Personal Accounts & Services Checking Open Savings Money Market Enroll Mobile Banking Loans & Lines of Credit Apply Platinum MasterCard ® Tools & Resources Calculators Budgeting & Spending Tools Building an Emergency Fund Monitoring/Improving Your Credit Telephone Banking Enjoy exceptional spending power, service and rewards with a credit card that is loaded with your choice of perks like cash-back rewards, travel services or merchandise. No annual fee. Learn More Business SBA Business Loans Cash Management Business MasterCard Merchant Services Eight Elements of a Business Plan Managing Business Cash Flow Beneficial Ownership Increase your payment options, improve customer satisfaction and drive more revenue with our merchant services that make it easy to process credit and debit card payments quickly and securely. Managed Accounts Retirement Planning Business Retirement Accounts Our Investment Philosophy Quarterly Market Perspective Meet Our Advisors About Us CEFEX Certified Advisory Services Enjoy the confidence of knowing that our expert advisors are helping to shape your financial future as determined by your goals, risk tolerance and time horizon. Let the journey begin here. Home Loans Fixed Rate Mortgage Mortgage Refinance Bank Owned Properties Home Equity Meet Our Dedicated Team Free Consultation Mortgage Loan Status Buying a Home Current Mortgage Rates Mortgage Pricing Scenarios Is it Time to Refinance? Handling the entire process. As a direct lender, nothing is outsourced. This means your closing will happen on time, at the rate and terms you were promised. No surprises. Insurance Community About Scheduled Maintenance We will have scheduled system maintenance on Sunday, April 21st at 1 AM to 5 AM ET.  Online and Mobile Banking will be unavailable during these times. Login Search Username Password Forgot Password Online Banking Enrollment Personal Enrollment Business Enrollment 401(k) Center NETXInvestor YOU HAVE QUESTIONS
